channel.title: Slayer (NEW POST) MAYBE SOMEONE CAN HELP ME NOW?
channel.description:
Hello fellow members, today i am here to request some help on a certain thing i'd wish to include in my server, what i want is;
Slayer to be leveled by just killing the npc's at the specific level, instead of having to goto a slayer master to get your task, just need a little advise on how to start going at this, as i cannot find it anywhere on google! Thanks:) (I hope you can help me).
P.S. if anyone does know where this is on google, please link me too it :)
-Sorry forgot to mention, this is for a PI server!

item.dc:creator: @purple123ftw purple123ftw
item.description:
@purple123ftw wrote:

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1628: error: cannot find symbol
for(int j = 0; j < validSlayerMonsters.length()-1;j++){
^
symbol: method length()
location: variable validSlayerMonsters of type int[]
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

got this error now :S

item.description:
@purple123ftw wrote:

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1628: error: bad operand types for binary operator '-'
for(int j = 0; j < validSlayerMonsters-1;j++){
^
first type: int[]
second type: int
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error

got this error :S

item.source: Slayer (NEW POST) MAYBE SOMEONE CAN HELP ME NOW?

item.title: Slayer (NEW POST) MAYBE SOMEONE CAN HELP ME NOW?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“purple123ftw, post:3, topic:534695”]public void appendSlayerExperience(int i) { int npc = 0; Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy]; if(c != null) { if (c.slayerTask == npcs[i].npcType){ c.taskAmount--; c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); if (c.taskAmount <= 0) { c.getPA().addSkillXP((npcs[i].MaxHP * 8) * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); c.slayerTask = -1; c.sendMessage("You completed your slayer task. Please see a slayer master to get a new one."); } } } }

This is my “appendSlayerExperience” need a bit of help, quite new to rsps coding.[/quote]
Let me break the code down a bit for you, well the parts you need to modify.

if (c.slayerTask == npcs[i ].npcType){
This checks if your slayer Task is equal to the npc you just killed. This is the key piece you’d want to edit because it’s the main check for adding exp.

c.taskAmount–;
this removes an npc from your task, which you no longer need because you’re getting rid of the task system.

c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[ i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18);
This adds XP to the slayer skill, based off of the npc’s max health and your slayer exp multiplier in config.java

if (c.taskAmount <= 0) {
Checks if your task amount is 0 or below.

c.slayerTask = -1;
Sets your slayer task to -1 making it so you can’t gain exp for slayer anymore. Again this won’t be needed in the new formula.

and i assume you know what c.sendMessage does.

Now we want to remove the code we don’t want, and make our own.

First trim out all the code:

[code=java]
public void appendSlayerExperience(int i) {
Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy];
if(c != null) {

 }

}[/code]

Now we want to store all the npcs of your choosing into an array (at least, that’s how I’m doing it here). These will be the npc’s you can attack for slayer exp.

Next, you want to check if the npc you just killed is part of the array, so you’re going to want to create a loop.

[code=java]for(int j = 0; j < validSlayerMonsters-1;j++){

}[/code]
This loops through all the npcs in validSlayerMonsters (The array we made earlier).

Now you need to add the if statement to check.

[code=java]
for(int j = 0; j < validSlayerMonsters-1;j++){
if(npcs[i].npcType == validSlayerMonsters[j]){

 }

}[/code]

And lastly, you want it to give exp.

for(int j = 0; j < validSlayerMonsters-1;j++){ if(npcs[i].npcType == validSlayerMonsters[j]){ c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); } }

Final product:

public void appendSlayerExperience(int i) { int validSlayerMonsters[] = {101, 1238, 4583, 4652, 7698};//Random ID's so don't use these. Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy]; if(c != null) { for(int j = 0; j < validSlayerMonsters-1;j++){ if(npcs[i].npcType == validSlayerMonsters[j]){ c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); } } } }

@purple123ftw wrote:

public void appendSlayerExperience(int i) { int npc = 0; Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy]; if(c != null) { if (c.slayerTask == npcs[i].npcType){ c.taskAmount--; c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); if (c.taskAmount <= 0) { c.getPA().addSkillXP((npcs[i].MaxHP * 8) * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); c.slayerTask = -1; c.sendMessage("You completed your slayer task. Please see a slayer master to get a new one."); } } } }

This is my “appendSlayerExperience” need a bit of help, quite new to rsps coding.
